about_the_game:
Give your female Japanese characters more things to talk about with Vol 2 of Japanese Anime Voices! Picking up where Vol 1 left off, this pack offers more common, everyday phrases useful for game dialog. Go ahead and give your female players more things to talk about and expand their dialog!

Features:

* 127 Japanese animation-like female voices (phrases) for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Female voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPGs and much more!
* English translation file included
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engines of your choice!

detailed_description:
Give your female Japanese characters more things to talk about with Vol 2 of Japanese Anime Voices! Picking up where Vol 1 left off, this pack offers more common, everyday phrases useful for game dialog. Go ahead and give your female players more things to talk about and expand their dialog!

Features:

* 127 Japanese animation-like female voices (phrases) for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Female voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPGs and much more!
* English translation file included
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engines of your choice!
